Text:

Thanks! +1

I use this and worked like a charm,  BUT: every now and then ther`s a writing appearing on my desktop bottom right say`n this copy of windows in not genuine.  But it`s only a text and it`s not a problem.
This is for real? Is it for 32bit? Has anyone had any trouble with this?

Works.

I ran on 2 computers.  Both 32bit Windows7 Ultimate. Run the program in windows, It left all my firefox windows open too. 

The laptop had the windows is not valid, expired after 30days message, and this cleared up those messages (run crack, then 1 reboot). 

Great Program!
